Discount: Up to 40% OFF!LIMITED QTY - ONLY A FEW LEFT!BANDI Large Pocket Belt, Evening scroll Description BANDI Large Pocket Belts are the solution for carrying large tablet phones and passports for travel! Large phones are great, but can be hard to manage. With BANDI, you can effortlessly tuck your phone into the pocket and get on with your day! The Large Pocket Belt will also hold a passport safe and secure. BANDI is a stylish solution for carrying other small essentials as well. Designed to be worn on the high hip, the beltâ?Ts feature a low-profile buckle for a comfortable and adjustable fit. The divided main pocket will hold an iPhone 6 Plus (or similar) on one side and cash, cards and passport on the other. A small side pocket is perfect for keys, lip balm, tissues, or small medical devices. Available in a variety of colorful prints you can find one to match your own unique style. Don't ever find yourself wondering how you are going to manage your large phone or passport again! Features & Specs - Sleek pocketed belt will hold even large tablet phones and passport - Stylish and secure, with no bulky zippers or Velcro - Low-profile buckle and adjustable slide for a secure no-bounce fit - Divided main pocket to separate phone from money - Extra side pocket for keys, coins, tissues or lip balm About The Link Group Inc.We are a US company and all of our products are 100% officially licensed, brand new and factory sealed from the manufacturers.
